item.title: Give It a Try
item.description: Now this is really bearbones. I’m in a hurry toi pickup the kids. Laterz That didn’t work. Adding a title now. I’ve read this blog post and learned how to add a new post. So I’m giving it a try ðŸ˜„ Did a bit more reading anbd figured out a few things: - the draft field on new content should be set to false in order to publish it. Kind of normal.
